actions.script: Calendar cal = Calendar.instance cal.setTimeInMillis(startDate.time) yearFrom = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR) cal.add(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK, 30+businessDays) yearThru = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR) [yearFrom .. yearThru].each { ec.service.sync().name("mchile.HolidayServices.create#YearHolidays").parameter("year", it).call()}
